input:
List A:
- Monsters, Inc. (2001) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy - Plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.
- Black Swan (2010) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Thriller - Plot: Nina is a talented but unstable ballerina on the verge of stardom. Pushed to the breaking point by her artistic director and a seductive rival, Nina's grip on reality slips, plunging her into a waking nightmare.
- Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy - Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

List B:
- Matrix, The (1999) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi - Plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
- Requiem for a Dream (2000) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
- American Beauty (1999) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

List A:
- Finding Nemo (2003) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family - Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
- Get Out (2017) - Genres of the movie: Horror, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: A young African-American visits his White girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.
- Forrest Gump (1994) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Romance - Plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

List B:
- Schindler's List (1993) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, History - Plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
- Zodiac (2007) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.
- Braveheart (1995) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, History, War - Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

List A:
- Princess Bride, The (1987) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Romance - Plot: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
- 12 Years a Slave (2013) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, History - Plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
- Lost in Translation (2003) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama - Plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
- Wreck-It Ralph (2012) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

List B:
- Fugitive, The (1993) - Genres of the movie: Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.
- Perks of Being a Wallflower, The (2012) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: Charlie, a 15-year-old introvert, enters high school and is nervous about his new life. When he befriends his seniors, he learns to cope with his friend's suicide and his tumultuous past.
- Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (1998) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Drama - Plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.
- Brokeback Mountain (2005) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Romance - Plot: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

List A:
- Meet the Parents (2000) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Romance - Plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.
- Back to the Future (1985) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi - Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
- American Beauty (1999) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
- Shutter Island (2010) - Genres of the movie: Mystery, Thriller - Plot: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

List B:
- Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Romance - Plot: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.
- Snatch (2000) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Crime - Plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
- Edward Scissorhands (1990) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Fantasy, Romance - Plot: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.
- The Fault in Our Stars (2014) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Romance - Plot: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

List A:
- Serenity (2005) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.
- Wreck-It Ralph (2012) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.
- Departed, The (2006) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Thriller - Plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
- Emperor's New Groove, The (2000) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy - Plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.
- The Hateful Eight (2015) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller, Western - Plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

List B:
- I Am Legend (2007) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
- Secret Life of Walter Mitty, The (2013) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance - Plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.
- Lord of War (2005) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama - Plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.
- Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows (2011) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Mystery - Plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.
- Matrix Revolutions, The (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi - Plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

List A:
- Gran Torino (2008) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.
- L.A. Confidential (1997) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
- Avatar (2009) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

List B:
- Intouchables (2011) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Comedy, Drama - Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
- Taxi 4 (2007) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy, Crime - Plot: Daniel, the driver of a very special taxi in Marseille, gets a famous soccer player to the stadium in time and later helps his clumsy police friend Émilien catch the dangerous Belgian after he escaped on Émilien's guard.
- 50 First Dates (2004) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Romance - Plot: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

List A:
- American Beauty (1999) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
- Game, The (1997) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.
- Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan (2006) - Genres of the movie: Comedy - Plot: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

List B:
- Finding Nemo (2003) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family - Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
- Logan (2017) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.
- Moana (2016) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical - Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

List A:
- V for Vendetta (2006) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.
- Grand Budapest Hotel, The (2014) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Crime - Plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.
- Billy Elliot (2000) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Music - Plot: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.
- Truman Show, The (1998) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama - Plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.
- Forrest Gump (1994) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Romance - Plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

List B:
- Kingsman: The Secret Service (2015) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Thriller - Plot: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.
- Dirty Dancing (1987) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Music, Romance - Plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.
- Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The (2002) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy - Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
- Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Romance - Plot: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

List A:
- Joker (2019) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Thriller - Plot: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.
- Hot Fuzz (2007) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.
- Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004) - Genres of the movie: Action, Crime, Thriller - Plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
- Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Crime, Drama - Plot: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

List B:
- The Martian (2015) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Drama, Sci-Fi - Plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.
- Shutter Island (2010) - Genres of the movie: Mystery, Thriller - Plot: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.
- Forrest Gump (1994) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Romance - Plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
- Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy - Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

List A:
- Matrix Revolutions, The (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi - Plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
- Mud (2012) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Drama - Plot: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.
- Short Term 12 (2013) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: A 20-something supervising staff member of a residential treatment facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.

List B:
- Harold and Kumar Go to White Castle (2004) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy - Plot: A Korean-American office worker and his Indian-American stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
- Waterworld (1995) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi - Plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.
- Fight Club (1999) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

List A:
- Dallas Buyers Club (2013) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama - Plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.
- Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The (2002) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy - Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
- Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Romance - Plot: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

List B:
- Good bye, Lenin! (2003) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Romance - Plot: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.
- La La Land (2016) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Music, Musical, Romance - Plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.
- Ghost in the Shell (2017) - Genres of the movie: Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

List A:
- Zootopia (2016) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Family, Mystery - Plot: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
- Groundhog Day (1993) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance - Plot: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.
- Toy Story 3 (2010) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy - Plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

List B:
- I, Robot (2004) - Genres of the movie: Action, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.
- Grand Budapest Hotel, The (2014) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Crime - Plot: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.
- Beautiful Mind, A (2001) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama - Plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

List A:
- Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, The (2002) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy - Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
- Ocean's Twelve (2004) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Thriller - Plot: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

- The Imitation Game (2014) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, Thriller, War - Plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

List B:
- Iron Man (2008) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi - Plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
- American History X (1998) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama - Plot: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his footsteps.
- Warcraft (2016) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy - Plot: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.
- Wallace & Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit (2005) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery, Sci-Fi - Plot: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

List A:
- Slumdog Millionaire (2008) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Romance - Plot: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"
- Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.
- Jurassic Park (1993) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
- Bug's Life, A (1998) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family - Plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

List B:

- Guardians of the Galaxy 2 (2017) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi - Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.
- Taken (2008) - Genres of the movie: Action, Crime, Thriller - Plot: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
- Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical - Plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

List A:
- Jurassic Park III (2001) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.
- Pacific Rim (2013) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi - Plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.
- I Am Legend (2007) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

List B:
- Spotlight (2015) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Crime, Drama - Plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
- The Imitation Game (2014) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, Thriller, War - Plot: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

List A:

List B:

He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

List A:
- Looper (2012) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.
- Catch Me If You Can (2002) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Crime, Drama - Plot: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.
- Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical - Plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
- Deadpool (2016) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy - Plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

List B:

List A:
- Avatar (2009) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
- Being John Malkovich (1999) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy - Plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.
- WALL·E (2008) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Family, Sci-Fi - Plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
- Little Miss Sunshine (2006) - Genres of the movie: Comedy, Drama - Plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.
- 1917 (2019) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, War - Plot: April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.
- Beautiful Mind, A (2001) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama - Plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
- 28 Days Later (2002) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

List B:

- Shutter Island (2010) - Genres of the movie: Mystery, Thriller - Plot: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.
- Matrix, The (1999) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi - Plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
- Pulp Fiction (1994) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama - Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
- Intouchables (2011) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Comedy, Drama - Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
- Split (2017) - Genres of the movie: Horror, Thriller - Plot: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.
- Requiem for a Dream (2000) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

List A:

- Bourne Identity, The (1988) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: An injured, unconscious man washes ashore in a small French town. As he recovers, it becomes quite clear, someone is trying to kill him.

- Saving Private Ryan (1998) - Genres of the movie: Drama, War - Plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
- Gravity (2013) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
- Jurassic Park (1993) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

List B:

- Prisoners (2013) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.
- Limitless (2011) - Genres of the movie: Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

List A:

List B:

- Logan (2017) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

List A:

- Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016) - Genres of the movie: Adventure, Family, Fantasy - Plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.
- Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Mystery - Plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
- Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The (2001) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy - Plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
- Matrix, The (1999) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi - Plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
- Guardians of the Galaxy 2 (2017) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi - Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

List B:

List B:

- Incredibles, The (2004) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family - Plot: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

List A:
- Intouchables (2011) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Comedy, Drama - Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
- Aladdin (1992) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Romance - Plot: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.
- Departed, The (2006) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Thriller - Plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
- Social Network, The (2010) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama - Plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
- Finding Nemo (2003) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family - Plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

List B:
- Gattaca (1997) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
- Taxi 2 (2000) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy, Crime - Plot: Police inspector Emilien and his taxi-driver pal Daniel are back, this time on the tail of a group of Japanese yakuza.
- Office Space (1999) - Genres of the movie: Comedy - Plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.
- L.A. Confidential (1997) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Thriller - Plot: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.
- Avatar (2009) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi - Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

List A:
- Memento (2000) - Genres of the movie: Mystery, Thriller - Plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
- District 9 (2009) - Genres of the movie: Action, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.
- Taxi 3 (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy, Crime - Plot: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

List B:
- 300 (2007) - Genres of the movie: Action, Drama - Plot: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
- Beautiful Mind, A (2001) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama - Plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
- Die Hard (1988) - Genres of the movie: Action, Thriller - Plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

List A:
- Fight Club (1999) - Genres of the movie: Drama - Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
- Up (2009) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family - Plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
- Spotlight (2015) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Crime, Drama - Plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.
- Finding Dory (2016) - Genres of the movie: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family - Plot: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.
- Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Fantasy - Plot: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
- Ex Machina (2015) - Genres of the movie: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

List B:
- Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005) - Genres of the movie: Action, Comedy, Crime, Thriller - Plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
- Hacksaw Ridge (2016) - Genres of the movie: Biography, Drama, History, War - Plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.
- Avengers: Infinity War - Part I (2018) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi - Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
- Maze Runner, The (2014) - Genres of the movie: Action, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller - Plot: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.
- Hell or High Water (2016) - Genres of the movie: Crime, Drama, Thriller, Western - Plot: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.
- Rogue One: A Star Wars Story (2016) - Genres of the movie: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi - Plot: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.
